guiclock-fabric.duskconfig.title: GUI Clock Config
guiclock-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_mustHave: When enabled, will only show the game time when a clock is present in the inventory.
guiclock-fabric.duskconfig.mustHaveClock: Must Have Clock In Inventory For Game Time
guiclock-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_mustHave: When enabled, will only show the real time when a clock is present in the inventory.
guiclock-fabric.duskconfig.mustHaveClock: Must Have Clock In Inventory For Real Time
guiclock-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_lowerClo: Whether the clock in the GUI should be lowered when the player has potion effects to prevent overlap.
guiclock-fabric.duskconfig.lowerClockWhe: Lower Clock When Player Has Effects
guiclock-fabric.duskconfig.DESC__24hourf: Sets the format of the clock to the 24-hour format.
guiclock-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_showOnly: When enabled, shows the clock item icon instead of a clock with numbers.
guiclock-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_showBoth: Show both in-game time and real local time.
guiclock-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_showReal: Show actual local time instead of in-game time.
Show the seconds in the clock.
guiclock-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_showDays: Show the days played in the world.
guiclock-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_clockPos: Places the GUI clock on the left.
Places the GUI clock in the middle.
Places the GUI clock on the right.
guiclock-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_clockHei: The vertical offset (y coord) for the Clock. This determines how far down the time should be on the screen. Can be changed to prevent GUIs from overlapping.
guiclock-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_clockWid: The horizontal offset (x coord) for the Clock.
guiclock-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_RGB_R: The red RGB value for the clock text.
guiclock-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_RGB_G: The green RGB value for the clock text.
guiclock-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_RGB_B: The blue RGB value for the clock text.
